description:
[h1]Introducing... the [b]Manned Turrets![/b][/h1]
These player controlled turrets are capable of many things:
[list]
[*]Taking down bots with potatoes/AA rounds/Ratshot
[*]Watering soil plots
[*]Lighting up an area
[*]Rapidly disassembling anything with Explosive Rounds/Guided Missiles/Air Strikes
[*]Rapidly relocating yourself
[*]Bringing along the nuclear winter with mounted nukes
[/list]

Be careful though, they're not invincible!

[h1]All of this is available in survival, thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681]Questionable Mark's Modded Craftbot Recipes[/url]![/h1]

[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Vajdani[/b] - Scripting
[*][b]Illumina[/b] - Models, textures, thumbnail
[*][b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/QuestionMarko]Questionable Mark[/url][/b] - Nuke explosion effect from the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1904783067]Cannons Pack[/url]
[/list]

Have fun!
name: Manned Turret Pack
